entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:18 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -41.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 10:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -41.9°C
Pressure: 99.2 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -45.9°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
